text: tAM ~MvAva dEqvA viji#ti-muttaqmA-masu#raiq-rvya#jayantaqyO BrAtRu#vyavAqnth- syAth sa sparddha#mAna EqtayEShTyA# yajEqtEndrA#yA(gm) hOqmucE# purOqDASaqmEkA#daSakapAlaqM nirva#pEqdindrA#ya vaimRuqdhAyEndrA#yEndriqyAvaqtE&(gm) ha#sAq vA EqSha gRu#hIqtO yasmAqcCrEyAqn BrAtRu#vyOqyadindrA#yA(gm) hOqmucE# niqrvapaqtya(gm)ha#sa Eqva tEna# mucyatEmRuqdhA vA EqShO#&BiSha#NNOq yasmA$th samAqnEShvaqnyaH SrEyA#nuqtA - [  ]  7
